text: Ezɨ Josep gumazamizibagh amima, me Isipɨn kantrin aven vong ko vong sara ingangarir gumazamizir kɨnibar mɨn iti.47:21 Gumaziba fomɨra akar kam, Grikɨn akamɨn a gɨgha ghaze, gumazir kaba ti kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Josep Isipɨn danganiba bar dar gumazamizibagh amizɨ, me atrivimɨn ingangarir gumazamizir kɨnibar ike.”
